items.title: Ros Atkins on... What's in the US-Ukraine resources deal?
items.description: The BBC's analysis editor looks at what has been agreed in the much-anticipated agreement.

items.title: Deadly clashes in Syria's Druze areas raise fears of widening unrest
items.description: The sectarian violence involving Islamist factions, security forces and Druze gunmen is another sign of the fragile security situation.

items.title: Next round of Iran-US nuclear talks postponed
items.description: The delay comes after Washington imposed new sanctions targeting Iran on Wednesday.

items.title: National Security Adviser Mike Waltz to leave role, US media reports
items.description: Waltz was under pressure after a journalist was mistakenly added to a group chat in which senior officials were discussing military strikes.

items.title: Tanzanian priest - and government critic - brutally attacked
items.description: The attack on a Catholic priest comes amid rising political tensions ahead of October's elections.
